bibl.title: A Ptolemaic Agreement Concerning a Donkey with an Unusual Warranty Clause. The Strange Case of P. dem. Princ. 1 (Inv. 7524). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper read before the 7th International Conference of Demotic Studies in Copenhagen, 23-27 August 1999. - See pp. 54-61: The paucity of animal conveyances under the Ptolemies.
MANNING Joseph G., A Ptolemaic Agreement Concerning a Donkey with an Unusual Warranty Clause. The Strange Case of P. dem. Princ. 1 (Inv. 7524). Avec résumé en anglais.
Enchoria 28 (2002/2003) pp. 46-61, 3 tabl., 1 fig. et pl. 6.
